text:
I have a setup using mod_rewrite + mod_ssl and ssl client proxy:

/ssl/ -> https://hostname1/
/clear/ -> http:/hostname2/

I enable SSLProxy engine

I get a segfault when the ssl client is reading server certificate
creator: mestrade@apache.org
mestrade@apache.org
text:
It's not a bug - sorry

Next time, i will think i am testing my dev tree.
Sorry for this wrong post
